Keep 1 or 2 of this tiny scroll, and be sure to KS when the clash started!

Or some way out if you chasing your victims way too far

RAMPAGE!!!

ItemTooltips.invis_sword:

ItemTooltips.mask_of_madness:
More damage taken? dont take it!

That's why we need dagger!
turn off the 1st skill is an option with this item, and you can get rossan at 16 only with this item in pocket!

-Dagger
-Silence
-MoM
-TRIPLEKILL!!!
ItemTooltips.ring_of_aquila: 1 item with allot of magic in it!

AbilityTooltips.drow_ranger_frost_arrows:
Aspd Slower
MS slower

Let you hit the target much more! and when used with brain, it can numb your enemy till they decide to commited a suicide!
AbilityTooltips.drow_ranger_silence: get it at lvl 4 or 2, keep it at low lvl for early game, cause usually the fight wont last for long, go for slow and damage to get all the kill u need!
AbilityTooltips.drow_ranger_trueshot: Max this out Asap, you'll be a big help just by being in the map!
AbilityTooltips.drow_ranger_marksmanship:
Half of it if there any enemy get a bit too near,
That's why we need dagger, thats what this guide is all about!
